name: Michael J. SHIRLEY, by his mother, Sharon SHIRLEY, natural guardian, Appellees, v. Mehdi B. JAVAN, M.D., Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: Michael J. SHIRLEY, by his mother, Sharon SHIRLEY, natural guardian, Appellees, v. Mehdi B. JAVAN, M.D., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
NIGRO, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Irving M. Green, Kensington, for appellant.
Annaliese P. Masser, Greensburg, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
712 A.2d 281
Michael J. SHIRLEY, by his mother, Sharon SHIRLEY, natural guardian, Appellees, v. Mehdi B. JAVAN, M.D., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 10, 1998.
Decided July 21, 1998.
Irving M. Green, Kensington, for appellant.
Annaliese P. Masser, Greensburg, for appellees.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
